    • 方法详细资料

      • getCities

        public java.util.List<City> getCities(java.lang.String iso)
        从接口复制的说明: CityDao
        This will return a list of cities whose ISO can match the parameter you pass into.
        指定者:
        getCities 在接口中 CityDao
        参数:
        iso - ISO of a country or region
        返回:
        A list of cities

      • countryCityMatch

        public boolean countryCityMatch(int cityCode,
                                java.lang.String iso)
        从接口复制的说明: CityDao
        To check whether the city belongs to the country
        指定者:
        countryCityMatch 在接口中 CityDao
        参数:
        cityCode - The citycode that can represent the city
        iso - The ISO that represents the country
        返回:
        If the city belongs to the country, returns true. Otherwise, it returns false.
